definition: (bird species of China) Eurasian skylark (Alauda arvensis)
surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]
(bird species of China) oriental skylark (Alauda gulgula)

sentences.english: The tiny little skylark stroked the daisy, and flew away to the wide and blue sky.
sentences.chinese: 小云雀抚摸着小雏菊，带着她飞向广阔的蓝天。

sentences.english: Are you the skylark in my dream?
There are always skylarks , their songs hanging over the field of dark gold.
sentences.chinese: 在深金色的田野上空总有飞翔的云雀以及他们的歌声。

sentences.english: But a lark is really the best thing to get up with.
sentences.chinese: 其实跟着云雀起床才是再好不过的。

sentences.english: The sky was blue, the larks was soaring high over the green corn.
sentences.chinese: 长天一片澄蓝，碧绿的庄稼上云雀凌空穿飞。

sentences.english: Lovers live by love,as larks live by leeks.
sentences.chinese: 情侣靠爱情生活，正象云雀靠韭葱生活一样。

sentences.english: A Skylark wounded in the wing.
The larks were singing and beautiful spring had come.
sentences.chinese: 清晨时分，侏儒在云雀的歌声中醒来。

sentences.english: There were always skylarks, their songs hanging over the fields of dark gold.
sentences.chinese: 总会有云雀的歌声萦绕在沉甸甸金黄色的田野上空。

sentences.english: I saw and heard a skylark fly between the two.
sentences.chinese: 我看见，听到一只云雀飞翔在蓝天碧野之间。

sentences.english: Then the lark is so brimful of gladness and love.
sentences.chinese: 这时云雀满怀着喜悦和爱。

sentences.english: If the sky falls, we shall catches larks .
"The little skylarks told their mother this news . Mother said :"It's time to move house.
sentences.chinese: 小云雀听到这个消息，赶快告诉了妈妈。

sentences.english: The poem is entitled Ode to Skylark .
sentences.chinese: 这首诗的题目是《云雀颂》。

definition: (bird species of China) northern goshawk (Accipiter gentilis)
bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam
to circle in the air/to soar
(bird species of China) oriental skylark (Alauda gulgula)
